text: Carlos Polestico Garcia (November 4, 1896 â€“ June 14, 1971) was a Filipino teacher, poet, and politician. He was the eighth President of the Philippines from 1957 to 1961. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Presidents of the Philippines Category:Vice presidents of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Central Visayas
